summary: Have you a follower powerful in their adventures.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][color=red][b]Updates:[/b]Crossbow Bugs fix, sparks power removed[/color][/size]

[size=2]I present to you my newest follower, his full name is "Benjamin Taylor", he is nord, half dragonborn, uses magic, crossbow, sword and shout too!
The level it is 80, but for it to work requires the Dawnguard DLC + Update 9 or higher!
He is in the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood![/size]


[size=3][color=red][b]Incompatibility:[/b][/color][/size]
*Never

[size=3][color=red][b]Recommends:[/b][/color][/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]
UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url] or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15524]
Amazing Follower Tweaks[/url]

My other mod:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19942]
Cyrus Delvin Follower[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25228]
Serana Enhanced[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25254]
Hestla Merchant Upgrade[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32430]
DRAGONBORN ENB[/url]
author: Kassane
